violationsByInspectionidList.name: Ashe Supply Co.
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: A toilet room used by females shall be provided with a covered receptacle for sanitary napkins.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Ashe Supply Co.
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: A test kit or other device that accurately measures the concentration in mg/L of SANITIZING solutions shall be provided. (Pf)

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Ashe Supply Co.
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: Cleaned EQUIPMENT and UTENSILS, laundered LINENS, and SINGLE-SERVICE and SINGLE-USE ARTICLES shall be stored in an approved manner and location.
violationsByInspectionidList.problemDescription: Stored on floor or less than 6 inches above floor
violationsByInspectionidList.subLocation: On the floor Single service items
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Store at least 6 inches above the floor.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Ashe Supply Co.
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: Washed UTENSILS and EQUIPMENT shall be rinsed so that abrasives are removed and cleaning chemicals are removed or diluted through the use of water or a detergent-SANITIZER solution by APPROVED procedures.
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Provide distinct clear water rinse after washing and before sanitizing.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Ashe Supply Co.
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: Cleaned EQUIPMENT and UTENSILS, laundered LINENS, and SINGLE-SERVICE and SINGLE-USE ARTICLES shall be stored in an approved manner and location.
violationsByInspectionidList.problemDescription: Stored on floor or less than 6 inches above floor
violationsByInspectionidList.subLocation: On the floor Single service items
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Store at least 6 inches above the floor.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Ashe Supply Co.
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: NonFOOD-CONTACT SURFACES of EQUIPMENT that are exposed to splash, spillage, or other FOOD soiling or that require frequent cleaning shall be constructed of a CORROSION-RESISTANT, nonabsorbent, and SMOOTH material.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Ashe Supply Co.
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: Except as otherwise allowed, a toilet room located on the PREMISES shall be completely enclosed and provided with a tight-fitting and self-closing door.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Ashe Supply Co.
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: PHYSICAL FACILITIES shall be maintained in good repair.
